title: Greener Nanobiopolymers and Nanoencapsulation: Environmental Implications and Future Prospects

To reduce the use of non-renewable resources and to maintain environmental sustainability, there ought to be an enhanced deployment of abundant and renewable greener nanobiopolymers, especially originating from assorted plants...
